content: I'm heading to the upcoming Connectathon and want to attend some of the tutorials afterwards on Mon-Wed to make the very long travel trip worthwhile. I don't fully understand the registration check boxes I would need to tick to have that happen though. I thought initially that the All Days option would have been the right choice to cover the Connectathon and the Tutorials. However, it seems there is a per tutorial cost over and above the cost per day. Is that correct?

Correct. On occasion there are 'free' tutorials, but almost all are an extra cost. The "all days" registration just gives you the ability to attend the meeting and have breakfast and lunch and cookie break.
Ok, thanks. Is there a way to just attend the tutorials? Looks like the only option is to pay for the day and then the tutorial on top.
That's the only option. The price for the day is sort of your "admission" price to the fair. Tutorials count as a "premium ride" :)
